name: Dinner Tonight: Chipotle Smashed Sweet Potatoes
description: I’ve had chipotle mashed potatoes with regular old russets a few times, but they didn’t do much for me. Though far from atrocious, nothing new was created. It just tasted like mashed potatoes with an awkward tinge of heat, not...
recipeIngredient: 1 large sweet potato, peeled and cubed
1/2 teaspoon of adobo sauce from the can

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the sweet potatoes for 20 minutes until very tender. I used a bamboo steamer set over a large pasta pot. But a regular steamer basket works, too.
Transfer sweet potatoes to a large bowl, add the butter, and smash with a potato masher.
Add the pepper, the sauce, and season with salt. Mash until combined and serve.
